name: A Tale of Timun Mas: Buto's Covenant
name_original: A Tale of Timun Mas: Buto's Covenant
description:
Halo!, we're from Batara Games.

We presented to you our game. An action rpg video game which bring back the memory of old about video game in the past with a mix of our lovely country (Indonesia) folk lore in the game.

The game titled "A Tale of Timun Mas: Buto's Covenant"

We develop this game for Game Jam+ Indonesia 2022

How To Play:

  1. WASD = Movement
  2. LMB (Left Mouse Button) = Attack
  3. Space = Dodge

Our Team :

  • Billy as Team Leader & Composer
  • Abdul as Game Designer
  • Rofi as Game Designer
  • Erick as Lead Programmer
  • Sendi as Programmer
  • Jidan as Programmer
  • Rakoratsu as 2D Artist
  • Suryana as 3D Artist
